column5: A friend of mine sent me this link today. http://www.sunnewsnetwork.ca/video/1305119208001#.TthH0YE5rm0.email opinions ?

for the fishing, Eddies and Pym Island are far upstream from the reserve but that is a sad situation on the reserve, I agree with what the guy said "we send foreign aid all over the world, why is this happening in our own backyard?" (or something along those lines)
the funny thing is, i don't even have to watch a report by Sun to know that it's garbage.
Good to see you're keeping an open mind...
